mapper.select: SELECT u.nickname , d.content , d.created_at AS createdAt FROM diary d JOIN user u ON d.user_id = u.id JOIN forest f ON d.forest_id = f.id LEFT JOIN shared_forest sf ON f.id = sf.id WHERE f.id = #{forestId} AND d.created_at BETWEEN #{startDateTime} AND #{endDateTime}
SELECT f.id AS forestId , f.name AS forestName FROM shared_forest sf JOIN forest f ON sf.forest_id = f.id WHERE sf.user_id = #{userId}
